data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will persistently bring mainly fine weather to Guangdong for the rest of this week and early next week. It will be mild during the day with relatively large temperature difference between day and night over the region. An intense winter monsoon is expected to reach southern China midweek next week. Meanwhile, under the influence of a broad band of clouds, temperatures will fall appreciably over the region. The weather will be cold in the middle and latter parts of next week. Besides, the area of low pressure now over the western North Pacific will develop gradually in the next couple of days, and bring unsettled weather to the region. It will then move towards the vicinity of the seas east of the Philippines.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260114","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"Light winds force 2, becoming east to northeast force 4, occasionally force 5.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine.
